response.original_title: A Feminist Lens: The Art and Activism of Photographer Joan Roth
response.overview: The film focuses on five decades of Roth’s pioneering use of her camera to advocate for homeless women in New York City, document leaders in the U.S. women’s movement from the 1970s to today, and shine a light on the diverse lives of Jewish women around the world.
response.title: A Feminist Lens: The Art and Activism of Photographer Joan Roth
